welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Port Colborne, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful lakeside city known for its friendly locals, scenic views, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Port Colborne has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport is used for private and charter flights, providing a VIP experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport houses all of the airport's facilities, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a small concourse at Buffalo Niagara International Airport that primarily serves regional airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the largest concourse at Buffalo Niagara International Airport and serves major airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a fee for access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dunkirk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dunkirk Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal for all passengers.
